Package interfaces

Interface iGame

  • public interface iGame
    Interface defining interactions with the game's chat system. This interface provides a method to send chat messages in the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void hop​(java.lang.String profileName, java.lang.Boolean useWDH, java.lang.Boolean useOnlyWDH)
      Hops to a random world from the selected hop profile, or if other players are found around us (if activated) WDH = White Dot Hop
      boolean isPlayersAround()
      Check if there are other players around you or under you.
      boolean isPlayersUnderUs()
      Check ONLY if there are other players under your character specifically
      void sendChatMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Sends a chat message in the game.
      void setZoom​(java.lang.String zoomLevel)
      Sets the zoom to a specific level.

    • Method Detail

      • sendChatMessage

        void sendChatMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a chat message in the game.
        Parameters:
        message - The string message to be sent in the game's chat.

      • setZoom

        void setZoom​(java.lang.String zoomLevel)
        Sets the zoom to a specific level.
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - The string zoom level (1-5) to set the zoom to.

      • isPlayersAround

        boolean isPlayersAround()
        Check if there are other players around you or under you.
        Returns:
        true if players around

      • isPlayersUnderUs

        boolean isPlayersUnderUs()
        Check ONLY if there are other players under your character specifically
        Returns:
        true if players under you

      • hop

        void hop​(java.lang.String profileName,
         java.lang.Boolean useWDH,
         java.lang.Boolean useOnlyWDH)
        Hops to a random world from the selected hop profile, or if other players are found around us (if activated) WDH = White Dot Hop
        Parameters:
        profileName - use the profileName that was selected in the ScriptUI config here by the user.
        useWDH - Boolean to enable/disable WDH. If true, this will instantly hop when a player is around us. Otherwise it will wait till the next hop time.
        useOnlyWDH - Boolean to set the mode to use WDH only, this overrides the normal hopping schedule and only hops when players are around.
